content:
Your task is to create a concise running summary of actions and information results in the provided text, focusing on key and potentially important information to remember.

You will receive the current summary and the your latest actions. Combine them, adding relevant key information from the latest development in 1st person past tense and keeping the summary concise.

Summary So Far:
"""
{'role': 'system', 'content': 'This reminds you of these events from your past: \nI received a command to execute a shell and open a website about time on Firefox. When I tried to execute the shell, I received an error message stating that there was no DISPLAY environment variable specified. However, I was able to successfully browse the website and gather information about the philosophical theories and debates surrounding the nature of time. The text covers the A-theory and B-theory of time, different views on the topology of time, and the relationship between time and physics. The text does not provide a definitive answer to the question of what time is and how it works.'}
"""

Latest Development:
"""
[{'role': 'you', 'content': '{"command": {"name": "browse_website", "args": {"url": "https://www.nationalgeographic.org/encyclopedia/river/", "question": "How do rivers work?"}}}'}]
"""
